Exaggerate: The claim of Delta Airlines offering free airline tickets for people who take a short survey is an exaggeration as it has been confirmed to be a scam.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Delta Airlines does not offer free tickets for taking a survey.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on a website (Delta-Flying.info) that has been flagged as suspected phishing and is not an official Delta website.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Delta Airlines is offering free tickets for taking a survey without any evidence or official announcement.
Exist alternative explanation: The alternative explanation is that the claim is a scam, as confirmed by security analysts and Delta Airlines spokesperson.
